main event: A witness observed a bright amber-colored light, circular in shape, moving in a straight line at a constant speed near Las Vegas, Nevada on July 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was approximately 15-20 ft in diameter and emitted no sound,The sighting lasted for 3 minutes and occurred about 1/2 hour after sunset,The object's movement was constant and straight from north to south before it vanished,No photograph was included in the report despite detailed observations,The report mentions a previous investigation related to a suspected landing area with no substantial evidence found.
witness description: the witness visually disturbed during reiteration of events and considered reliable
